participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Caring and introspective, Jordan values comfort and connection over appearances.
participant_1.background: I'd rather wear comfortable clothing than dress up. I like to enjoy my meals, so I don't go to fast food restaurants very often. I am going to school to get my bachelor's degree. I'm a parent who feels like a failure, but I'm trying to make things better by taking care of my cat.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Independent and reflective, Alex appreciates personal space and has a unique taste in music.
participant_2.background: My most difficult challenge was raising my children on my own. I like to wear boots. I used to be very outgoing, but now I prefer to keep to myself. My music taste is different from my parents' generation. I like cosplay.

content.text: I'm doing ok, thanks for asking.
What's your favorite type of music?
I like a variety of music, but I'm really into punk and rock right now.
Oh cool, I like punk rock too. What are some of your favorite bands?
I like Green Day, The Offspring, and Bad Religion. What about you?
I like The Clash, The Sex Pistols, and Black Flag.
Oh nice, I love those bands too!
Me too, they're some of the best punk bands ever.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, play video games, and read.
Oh cool, I like to do all of those things too.
We should hang out sometime and do something fun.
Cool, I'll text you my number.
